meta.title: Shop & Dine at Rockefeller Center | Best Midtown Shopping & Restaurants
meta.description: Spend the day finding the perfect fashion and the perfect bite. Rockefeller Center has the best restaurants in Manhattan, and an incredible Midtown shopping district.

shopAndDineHero.title: The Best of New York
shopAndDineHero.caption: At Rockefeller Center you’ll find some of the best places to shop and eat not only in Midtown Manhattan but in the entire city. For every taste, for every fashion, for every whim, you’re sure to find just the thing. So come, explore, discover. Rockefeller Center never fails to delight.

cards.title: Dine
cards.description: The finest restaurants, the most exciting food trends, and the culinary talent that drives the industry forward––Rockefeller Center has the dining options to satisfy everyone.

cards.title: Shop
cards.description: From up-and-coming local brands to the most iconic names in fashion, Rockefeller Center is a world-renowned destination for those who seek style.

fullCard.title: Amenities & Services
fullCard.description: Rockefeller Center has a wide array of amenities and services to meet your needs. From barbers and salons to niche retailers, you’re sure to find what you need right here.
